name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior JavaScript Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing robust backend systems, with a strong focus on **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and creating scalable **REST** and **SOAP** APIs. Proficient in databases such as **SQL**, **SQLite**, and **PostgreSQL** while leveraging **AWS Lambda** and **API Gateway** for cloud-native solutions. Skilled in implementing **Serverless Framework** for efficient application development and automated testing to ensure high-quality deliverables. Proven ability to contribute to successful **B2B SaaS** projects, fostering teamwork and clear communication throughout the development process. Extensive background in delivering impactful solutions for top-tier organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, alongside expertise in financial platforms, AI/ML pipelines, and high-performing automation tools.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed robust REST and SOAP APIs using **Node.js** to enhance backend services and streamline B2B SaaS products.
Engineered serverless solutions utilizing **AWS Lambda** and **API Gateway**, enhancing system scalability and efficiency in transaction processing.
Implemented automated testing frameworks ensuring code quality and reliability, reducing bug occurrence by **30%**.
Designed and managed SQL databases including **PostgreSQL** and **SQLite**, optimizing query performance and storage efficiency for **500+** users.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, fostering clear communication and teamwork to address integration challenges and enhance system performance.
Facilitated the transition of legacy systems to modern architecture, resulting in a **40%** increase in application responsiveness and user satisfaction.
Led the development and maintenance of comprehensive documentation, improving onboarding for new team members by **25%**.

Developed robust RESTful APIs and microservices in **JavaScript** and **Node.js**, enhancing system integration and user experience for B2B SaaS applications.
Designed and implemented automated testing processes to ensure code quality and reliability, achieving a **95%** test coverage rate.
Engineered scalable data storage solutions using **PostgreSQL** and **SQLite**, optimizing data access and management for applications serving over **10,000** users.
Utilized **AWS Lambda** and **API Gateway** to build serverless applications, significantly reducing infrastructure costs by **30%**.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, ensuring clear communication and alignment on project goals and timelines.
Streamlined documentation workflows and developed comprehensive guides for new features, contributing to a successful release cycle of **5 major updates** per year.
Implemented security best practices and data protection protocols to meet compliance with industry standards, focusing on user data integrity and privacy.

- Developed and maintained robust **REST** APIs for seamless interactions between front-end and back-end systems, fostering a responsive and user-friendly interface.
- Engineered backend services using **Node.js** and **PostgreSQL** to support B2B SaaS applications, managing **9 million** transactions efficiently.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design cloud-native solutions utilizing **AWS Lambda**, ensuring high availability and scalability.
- Implemented automated testing frameworks such as **Jest** and **Mocha** to enhance code reliability and streamline the QA process by reducing bugs by **30%**.
- Advocated for and implemented **Serverless Framework**, reducing infrastructure costs by **20%** and simplifying deployment processes.
- Utilized **SQL** for complex queries and data management, optimizing database performance and ensuring data integrity across applications.
- Engaged in continuous integration and deployment practices to maintain project momentum and adapt swiftly to changes, achieving delivery timelines consistently.
- Served as a clear communicator and team player, fostering collaboration to solve complex problems while ensuring compliance with industry standards.
